treatment-md.title: Abscondita perplexa Ballantyne, Fu, Lambkin, Jeng, Faust, Wijekoon, Li & Zhu, 2013, comb. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Studies on South-east Asian fireflies: Abscondita, a new genus with details of life history, flashing patterns and behaviour of Abs. chinensis (L.) and Abs. terminalis (Olivier) (Coleoptera: Lampyridae: Luciolinae)
